post.body: Duuuude...oj & rest!
good avatar!
'I went into Kenneth Cole & it was like I had on hooker clothes, like Julia Roberts.'
I loved that song. Didja have their Christmas album? Because, it's, like, totally rad!
Chez Nemanick having a good NYE party...cookies are a hit.
59,197 miles on AA alone for me. Was traveling & away from the office (M-F) 53 days.
Just saw 'Benjamin Buttons.' Excellent performances, good story, would recommend it, wouldn't watch it again...cuz it's 3hrs long.
"Everything's so easy for Pauline." I know how you feel, Margaret.
Going to the grocery. Feeling oddly content and unsettled at the same time. Needing yoga. And maybe fast food.
“For many of us, books were our first love object.” http://insidehighered.com/news/2009/01/02/mla
Taking the day off.
Having Cowboy Caviar: http://tinyurl.com/9hm9wn
Watching the Bones marathon, because the holidays are for TV marathons, apparently. Pix from NYE: http://flickr.com/photos/chrisfreeland ...
'Cheers big ears!' Yep, welcome to 2009.
Nearing the end of the Aughties...can't believe it!
2008, it's over. I was never that into you. Happy New Year all!
Making raita and Almost Tandoori Chicken http://tinyurl.com/7srfpq
Baking cookies. Isn't that what everyone does at 2am?
Sarah Palin's back in the news. Why won't "Granny Oakley" go away? http://www.cbsnews.com/stories/2008/12/30/earlyshow/main4691617.shtml
Making chocolate dipped pretzels for tomorrow's NYE party @ Chez Nemanick. Step 1: Melt chocolate. Step 2: Dip pretzels. Step 3: Eat.
